scripts.render:stat: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render src/index.tsx AlphaStatCardMotion ../public/assets/social/alpha-stat.mp4 --codec=h264 --crf=18 --pixel-format=yuv420p $npm_config_props
scripts.render:stat:desktop: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render AlphaStatCardMotion $HOME/Desktop/alpha-stat.mp4 --codec=h264 --crf=20 --pixel-format=yuv420p --frames-per-thumbnail=1
scripts.thumb:stat: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion still src/index.tsx AlphaStatCardMotion ../public/assets/social/alpha-stat.jpg --frame=1 --image-format=jpeg
scripts.render:thread: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render src/index.tsx AlphaStatCardThread ../public/assets/social/alpha-steth-thread.mp4 --codec=h264 --crf=18 --pixel-format=yuv420p $npm_config_props
scripts.thumb:thread: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion still src/index.tsx AlphaStatCardThread ../public/assets/social/alpha-steth-thread.png --frame=96 --image-format=png
scripts.gif:thread: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render src/index.tsx AlphaStatCardThread ../public/assets/social/alpha-steth-thread.gif --codec=gif --width=800 --height=450 --every-nth-frame=2 $npm_config_props
scripts.render:one: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render src/index.tsx AlphaOneClip ../public/assets/social/alpha-one.mp4 --codec=h264 --crf=18 --pixel-format=yuv420p $npm_config_props
scripts.thumb:one: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion still src/index.tsx AlphaOneClip ../public/assets/social/alpha-one.jpg --frame=1 --image-format=jpeg
scripts.render:tweet: pnpm run prepare:assets && remotion render src/index.tsx AlphaStethTweetClip ../public/assets/social/alpha-steth-tweet.mp4 --codec=h264 --crf=18 --pixel-format=yuv420p $npm_config_props
